Class Map

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Level1Map, Level2Map

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(char[][] map)
      Constructor of a map that stores the given parameter to the char[][] map variable that represents the game map

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addElementsMatrix(char[][] finalmap)
      Adds to a map all the doors and the key saved at the key and doors variables
      void ClearPosition(int x, int y)
      This function simply clears a position in the map matrix, so, the given position in the matrix is now defined by ' ' (not NUll)

      Checks if the first door in the doors list is opened by using the object Door function isOpened() (check door documentation)

      Gets the key of the map

      Gets the matrix that represents the map itself

      Gets the index of the doors list of the door at the given position if there is any door at that pos

      Function that sees if the given position on the matrix is free to move, that means the position is neither a wall nor a closed door
      void openDoors()
      Opens all the doors at the variable doors

      Creates a new key at the given position

    • Method Detail

      • moveTo

        public java.lang.Boolean moveTo(int x,
                                int y)
        Function that sees if the given position on the matrix is free to move, that means the position is neither a wall nor a closed door
        Parameters:
        x - position in the map (matrix)
        y - position in the map (matrix)
        Returns:
        true if the position is not a closed door or a wall, otherwise returns false

      • ClearPosition

        public void ClearPosition(int x,
                          int y)
        This function simply clears a position in the map matrix, so, the given position in the matrix is now defined by ' ' (not NUll)
        Parameters:
        x - position in the map
        y - position in the map

        Parameters:
        xPos - in the map
        yPos - in the map

        Opens all the doors at the variable doors

      • DoorsAreOpened

        public boolean DoorsAreOpened()
        Checks if the first door in the doors list is opened by using the object Door function isOpened() (check door documentation)
        Returns:
        true if the door is opened else returns false

      • setSaticMap

        public void setSaticMap(char[][] newmap)

      • verifyMoveDoors

        public boolean verifyMoveDoors(Character c)
        Function that checks if a character is trying to go through a door and if he is able to
        Parameters:
        c - character to know the position is trying to go to
        Returns:
        true if the door is opened and the character can go through the door or if the character is not trying to go through a door at all, otherwise returns false

      • IsOveraDoor

        public int IsOveraDoor(int x,
                       int y)
        Gets the index of the doors list of the door at the given position if there is any door at that pos
        Parameters:
        x - position in the map matrix
        y - position in the map matrix
        Returns:
        the index of the door that exist at the position, if there are no doors at the given position then returns -1

      • getMap

        public char[][] getMap()
        Gets the matrix that represents the map itself
        Returns:
        the map variable

      • setMapPosition

        public void setMapPosition(int x,
                           int y,
                           char element)
        Changes the given position in the matrix to the char given
        Parameters:
        x - position in the map matrix
        y - position in the map matrix
        element - going to be set in the position

      • addElementsMatrix

        public void addElementsMatrix(char[][] finalmap)
        Adds to a map all the doors and the key saved at the key and doors variables
        Parameters:
